oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Gov. Jim Nance McCord being congratulated by Gov. Prentice Cooper, on the steps of the Tennessee State Capitol; Inauguration Day, 1945.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Jim Nance McCord, a Democrat, was Governor from 1945-1949; he successfully pushed the first state sales tax, improving education and providing for teacher retirement.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: RG 82: Tennessee Department of Conservation Photograph Collection, 1937-1976
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Rites & ceremonies; Governors; Inaugurations; Political parades & rallies
